hicbit.hicbit_Init: hicbit initialization, please execute at boot time
hicbit.hicbit_SoundSensor: Set the Sound sensor status,1 detect the sound source,0 no detect the sound source 声音
hicbit.hicbit_TM1640LEDs._dat: set data to TM1640, with given bit
hicbit.hicbit_analyzeBluetoothCmd: Resolve the Bluetooth that phone APP send command type, the total of nine types of commands: tank display command, servo debug command, obtaining the distance of ultrasonic command, obtaining temperature command, obtain sound size rank orders, to obtain the light level command, set the color lights command, honking command, firmware version information command.
hicbit.hicbit_avoidSensor: Get the obstacle avoidance sensor status,1 detect obstacle,0 no detect obstacle 避障判断
hicbit.hicbit_belt_clearLight: Clear the color of the colored lights and turn off the lights.
hicbit.hicbit_belt_setPixelRGB: Set the color of the colored lights, after finished the setting please perform  the display of colored lights.
hicbit.hicbit_belt_showLight: Display the colored lights, and set the color of the colored lights to match the use. After setting the color of the colored lights, the color of the lights must be displayed.
hicbit.hicbit_clearLight: Clear the color of the colored lights and turn off the lights.
hicbit.hicbit_collisionsensor: Get the collision sensor status,1 trigger,0 no trigger 碰撞
hicbit.hicbit_convertBattery: Convert the battery value to the standard command and send it to the mobile phone. The APP displays the current voltage.
hicbit.hicbit_convertHandCmd: Convert the hand cmd to phone app
hicbit.hicbit_convertLight: Convert the light value to the standard command and send it to the mobile phone. The APP displays the current light level (0~255).
hicbit.hicbit_convertTemperature: The conversion temperature value to standard command, sent to the mobile phone, and the APP displays the current temperature.
hicbit.hicbit_convertUltrasonic: The distance from the ultrasonic obstacle is the standard command, which is sent to the mobile phone. The APP will indicate the distance of the ultrasonic obstacle.
hicbit.hicbit_digitaltube|param|count: the count of the LED, eg: 4
hicbit.hicbit_digitaltube|param|intensit: the brightness of the LED, eg: 7
hicbit.hicbit_getArgs: Resolve the parameters that the phone APP send the command,there are 3 parameters of servo debug command,the other command has just one parameter.
hicbit.hicbit_getBatVoltage: Get hicbit current voltage,the unit is mV
hicbit.hicbit_getBluetoothCmdtype: Returns the enumeration of the command type, which can be compared with this module after obtaining the bluetooth command type sent by the mobile phone APP.
hicbit.hicbit_getKnobValue: Get the ad value of the knob moudule 旋钮
hicbit.hicbit_getRunCarType: The command type of the tank is stop, go ahead, back, turn left, turn right, slow down, turn left slowly, turn right slowly.
hicbit.hicbit_getSoundVolume: Get the volume level detected by the sound sensor, range 0 to 255
hicbit.hicbit_getSoundsensorValue: Get the ad value of the Sound sensor moudule 声音AD
hicbit.hicbit_getavoidSensorValue: Get the ad value of the avoid Sensor moudule 避障AD
hicbit.hicbit_getphotosensitiveValue: Get the ad value of the photosensitive moudule 光敏
hicbit.hicbit_init_colorSensor: Initialize the color sensor,please execute at boot time
hicbit.hicbit_intensity: set TM1640 intensity, range is [0-8], 0 is off.
hicbit.hicbit_intensity|param|val: the brightness of the TM1640, eg: 7
hicbit.hicbit_photosensitiveSensor: Get the Photosensitive sensor status,1 detect bright,0 no detect bright 光敏
hicbit.hicbit_readAngle: Send read hicbit servos angle command
hicbit.hicbit_runActionGroup: Set the servo controller to run a actiongroup
hicbit.hicbit_setBrightness: Set the brightness of the strip. This flag only applies to future operation.
hicbit.hicbit_setBrightness|param|bright: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
hicbit.hicbit_setFanSpeed: Set the speed of the fan, range of -100~100.
hicbit.hicbit_setMotorSpeed:
Send robot attitude to the servo controller



Set the speed of the number 1 motor and number 2 motor, range of -100~100, that can control the tank to go advance or turn of.
hicbit.hicbit_setPixelRGB: Set the color of the colored lights, after finished the setting please perform  the display of colored lights.
hicbit.hicbit_showLight: Display the colored lights, and set the color of the colored lights to match the use. After setting the color of the colored lights, the color of the lights must be displayed.
hicbit.hicbit_showbit: show a number in given position.
hicbit.hicbit_showbit|param|bit: the position of the LED, eg: 0
hicbit.hicbit_ultrasonic: Get the distance of ultrasonic detection to the obstacle
hicbit.onhicbit_getAngle: Do someting when hicbit receive angle
hicbit.onhicbit_getAngle|param|body: code to run when event is raised
hicbit.onhicbit_getMac: Do someting when hicbit receive mac adress
hicbit.onhicbit_getMac|param|body: code to run when event is raised
hicbit.setServo: Set the angle of servo 1 to 8, range of 0~270 degree
hicbitRGBPixelMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W RGBLight QbitRGBColors
